activities: Lookout provides security software and services for smartphones.  In providing this service we collect some information (as detailed in our privacy policy) which is necessary to operate the service.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer data, automatically processed by software
recoursemech: For non-HR data, Lookout will cooperate with JAMS in accordance with the JAMS International Mediation Rules. For HR data only, Lookout will cooperate with EEA data protection authorities (EU DPAs) and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
